name: Hexnaut
description:
Goal: Delve into the dungeon, collecting as much treasure as you can without getting hit.  

Twist: You can't attack enemies, but enemies can attack each other.  They forecast their intentions each turn.

Use Q,W,E,A,S,D keys to move.

Let me know if any problems or feedback!  It's a quick play and not 100% polished.
